title: Provides that persons who  sell or rent video games shall display a warning with respect to the relationship between playing video games and epileptic seizures
summary: Provides that persons who sell or rent video games shall display a warning sign with respect to the relationship between playing video games and epileptic seizures; establishes penalties for a violation of such provisions.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring epilepsy warnings on video games
